Hi! I have 6+ years of experience working in ML. Currently, I'm a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at GoDaddy. My interests are in developing Agentic AI Systems and evaluating them using LangGraph and Langfuse. I also train ML models using PyTorch, Python and FastAPI.
